title: Innate Casting
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Gain [[spell]]s every 2 XL, but unable to use [[spellbook]]s.
[[Spellcasting]] is used instead of specific spell schools. ||You learn spells naturally, not from books. |- | colspan="3" | Spells start at XL 3, and rise in complexity as you gain levels.
This mutation forbids worship of the spell granting gods [[Sif Muna]], [[Vehumet]], and [[Kikubaaqudgha]].
'''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[Djinn]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
